card_text: You can activate 1 of the following effects.$N●Target 1 "Scareclaw" monster or 1 "Visas Starfrost" in your Monster Zone, and 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; your monster gains ATK/DEF equal to your opponent's monster's ATK or DEF (whichever is higher).$N●When a card or effect is activated that targets a "Scareclaw" monster or "Visas Starfrost" you control: Negate that effect.$NYou can only activate 1 "Scareclaw Straddle" per turn.
